Posts.EditableText: Like mrangel said you have to make the Steel Box a Closed Container. From the object Steel box on upper right their different tabs one of these tabs reads features, click on this then find "Container" in features tab and check this box. Once you do this a new tab will appear reading Container open this tab now you will see the container type click this and choose closed container, now below a bunch of options open up check the box that states " List Children when looked at or opened" now just put the key in box by dragging key to box then there you go. Now to add sound just below that add script to run after opening and place sound in there.
